about.title: About Me
about.summary: Software engineering student at Ort Braude (graduating in 2027), with hands-on experience in Node.js, React, Angular, and databases. Passionate about building scalable web applications, problem-solving, and working with modern web technologies. Looking for my first role as a Software Engineer or Fullstack Developer to apply my knowledge in real-world projects.

jobs.title: Technical Support Engineer
responsibilities: Troubleshoot and resolve server-related issues (OLT, DHCP, DNS).
Handle internet, TV, and phone issues, ensuring optimal service.
Developed strong problem-solving skills and experience in networking.

jobs.title: Technical Support Specialist
responsibilities: Provided technical support for phone & internet networks.
Diagnosed and resolved networking issues efficiently.
Improved customer satisfaction through clear communication & troubleshooting.

education.title: Education
education.courses: Relevant Courses: Data Structures, Algorithms, Operating Systems, OOP, Databases, Networking, Python, C, Human Interface, Introduction to Software Testing, Architecture
